bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Recommended Practice for the Protection of Power Cables and Busway Used in Industrial and Commercial Power Systems
IEEE Draft Recommended Practice for the Protection of Power Cables and Busway Used in Industrial and Commercial Power Systems

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This recommended practice covers the protection of conductors used in industrial and commercial power systems. It is likely to be of greatest value to the power-oriented engineer with limited experience in the area of protection and control. It can also be an aid to all engineers responsible for the electrical design of industrial and commercial power systems.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
